mapper.insert: insert into db_qtuser (USERID, 'PASSWORD', USERNAME, CUSTCD, CUSTNAME, PROVINCE, CITY, PHONE, FAX, EMAIL, OPERFLAG, OPER, OPERTIME, TOKEN, AREA, ADDRESS, POST) values (#{userid,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{password,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{username,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{custcd,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{custname,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{province,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{city,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{phone,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{fax,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{email,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{operflag,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{oper,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{opertime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{token,jdbcType=LONGVARCHAR}, #{area,jdbcType=LONGVARCHAR}, #{address,jdbcType=LONGVARCHAR}, #{post,jdbcType=LONGVARCHAR})
mapper.update: update db_qtuser set 'PASSWORD' = #{password,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, USERNAME = #{username,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, CUSTCD = #{custcd,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, CUSTNAME = #{custname,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, PROVINCE = #{province,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, CITY = #{city,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, PHONE = #{phone,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, FAX = #{fax,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, EMAIL = #{email,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, OPERFLAG = #{operflag,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, OPER = #{oper,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, OPERTIME = #{opertime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, TOKEN = #{token,jdbcType=LONGVARCHAR}, AREA = #{area,jdbcType=LONGVARCHAR}, ADDRESS = #{address,jdbcType=LONGVARCHAR}, POST = #{post,jdbcType=LONGVARCHAR} where USERID = #{userid,jdbcType=VARCHAR}
mapper.select: select USERID, 'PASSWORD', USERNAME, CUSTCD, CUSTNAME, PROVINCE, CITY, PHONE, FAX, EMAIL, OPERFLAG, OPER, OPERTIME, TOKEN, AREA, ADDRESS, POST from db_qtuser where USERID = #{userid,jdbcType=VARCHAR}
select USERID, 'PASSWORD', USERNAME, CUSTCD, CUSTNAME, PROVINCE, CITY, PHONE, FAX, EMAIL, OPERFLAG, OPER, OPERTIME, TOKEN, AREA, ADDRESS, POST from db_qtuser
